thread.title: Jennifer Birch
thread.title_full: Israel Institute of Biblical Studies (formerly eTeacherBiblical.com) reviewed by Jennifer Birch

author: Jennifer Birch
title: Jennifer Birch
text: I have found studying Hebrew with eTeacher to be very enjoyable. The teachers are caring, the courses suitably challenging and the support staff very efficient and friendly.
